GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Google Drive Client Secret from Google Cloud Platform

OWNER_ID.description: Your user id. (If you want to add more than 1 User, give IDs seperated by ',').The First user is the Admin

TELEGRAM_API.description: Your api_id, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: Your api_hash, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

Group_ids.description: Create a Super Group(s) and add ID Here. Add -1 if you don't want to add a group.(If More than 1 group Give IDs seperated by ',')
